output_list.criticism: The function does not check for the value of the balance of the sender, leading to potential integer overflow.
The function does not properly check the conditions for the transfer, leading to potential wrong logic.
The function does not have any checks for the balance of the sender or the receiver, leading to potential bad randomness.
The function does not have any checks for the permissions of the sender or the receiver, leading to potential access control issues.
The function does not have any checks for the balance of the sender or the target, leading to potential typos in the constructor.
